idea:
Crossways Gourmet Foods: 

Vegetarian Food Store with Vegan options. Trying to help the people who are trying to help the planet survive and become a better place by going plant based. 100% compostable packaging and lip smacking customisable products. All our products are customisable to consumer needs and requirements. Without the use of preservatives, emulsifiers or any other synthetic food preservatives. Made fresh, served fresh and delivered fresh. 


Crossways Farming Co.: 

Bringing the farming experience to flats and apartments. Providing Farming as a service we would be building customised soilless hydroponic systems in Residences, Restaurants, Farmhouses with integrated water quality monitoring via Crossways applications while only charging a installation fee and maintenance fees to the consumer. 


In the future planning to demonstrate how cities and municipalities can be self sustaining adopting a plant based lifestyle and growing, styling the own food in order to make cities and towns self sufficient to a large extent, reducing reliance on carbon intensive processes.
name: Crossways Ecogreens Private Limited

idea:
Vision:

To work towards healthy and quality life for each individual


Mission:

To mitigate environmental impacts through

- Validation & Design

- Research & Advisory

- Capacity Development


About:

Essential India team is in the field of sustainability from the year 2020. Our aim is to provide a living environment through sustainable building design & operation. We energy consultancy firm and working closely with architects, MEP engineers, owners, and other stakeholders providing energy efficiency solutions. We collaborate with various stakeholders to create a building design that has less climate impact, reducing carbon footprint, and maximize thermal comfort. We provide services that deal with passive design solutions, lighting solutions, energy auditing, energy assessment, energy modeling & code compliance, green rating compliance, climate and microclimate analysis, renewable energy systems integration, and daylight analysis.

Our extensive experience in high-performance building consulting, energy modelling, building commissioning, and marketing of our projects, as well as hands-on experience in the trades has well-equipped our firm to meet all your needs as they relate to green building to move your company towards total sustainability. The combined skills and experience of our diverse staff allows us to quickly become a value-added member of any project team. We leverage this wisdom and knowledge to help your company identify and implement the most cost-effective and environmentally responsible green building strategies.
name: ESSENTIAL INDIA

idea: Egg buyers are concerned about the freshness of the eggs purchased. But, there is no way of knowing the source and freshness of eggs purchased from a local store or the cycle Wallaâ€™s. In modern supermarkets, there may be some branding on eggs, but the freshness can still not be verified. Besides, these modern stores do not contribute even 1% to total sales. To address this opportunity, the founders planned to develop a new age multi-channel egg-delivery platform named Arden Mart, which not only helps customers verify the freshness of eggs but also helps them trace the source of it.
name: ARDEN EGGS AND PACKS PRIVATE LIMITED
